service1.charge_customer_wallet(username, amount)[source]

this function charges a customer’s wallet by a certain amount

Parameters:

  • username (str) – the username of the customer

  • amount (float) – the amount to be charged

this function connects to the database :returns: connection to the database :rtype: conn

service1.create_db_table()[source]

this function creates the customer table in the database

service1.deduct_from_customer_wallet(username, amount)[source]

this function deducts from a customer’s wallet by a certain amount

Parameters:

  • username (str) – the username of the customer

  • amount (float) – the amount to be deducted

service1.insert_customer(customer)[source]

Return type:
